text:
I usually enjoy visiting this establishment for its delicious latte and mac and cheese. The coffee and most menu items are consistently excellent. However, my experience today was disappointing.

I decided to try the Teriyaki Garlic Cream Pasta, but unfortunately, the chicken was not fresh, which affected the overall flavor of the dish. Even after avoiding the chicken, the pasta itself had an unpleasant taste likely due to its preparation alongside the chicken.

Additionally, Iâ€™ve noticed that one of the servers tends to provide portions smaller than expected, which can be a bit disheartening given the usual quality of service.

Despite todayâ€™s experience, I appreciate the quality of the coffee and other menu offerings and hope these concerns can be addressed to maintain the high standards Iâ€™ve come to expect here.

A great cafÃ© for a quick bite before an event at the National Stadium.

Both the beef bacon and mushroom melt sandwich and the blueberry scone are delicious. The sandwich bun is warm and soft, while the blueberry scone is also heated.

Visited on a Sunday afternoon, about 40% occupied . Their latte art have make my day! We order Manuka honey latte and flat white, with panda cake. The cake is too sweet for us. Beverages are perfectly done :)
Pls continue with creative latte art, I love them so much!

Super crowded on a raining Sunday morning, crew overwhelmed with fully packed seats but barrister still took trouble to serve drinking water despite not regular service item.
Food were generally good except portion wanting, accompanied toast was thinly sliced ðŸ¤¨

Not so crowded Saturday late morning but short of manpower, so the place was quite dirty.
Scrambled eggs was tasteless, croissant doesnâ€™t have butter taste.
Coffee was ok.
